title: Adobe Advertising Cloud Ad Delivery Details
description: Adobe Advertising Cloud Search Ad Delivery Details.

placementWebsite.title: Placement website
placementWebsite.description: Website where the advertisement was shown.

siteLinkText.title: Site Link Text
siteLinkText.description: Actual site link is being clicked in advertisement.

interestLocationID.title: Interest Location Identifier
interestLocationID.description: Location based on interest expressed in search query. For eg. when the search is for string- 'hotel in goa' here the request might be originating from Bangalore but the interest is on Goa.

physicalLocationID.title: Physical Location Identifier
physicalLocationID.description: Surfer browsing location. This isn't exactly the location name - like city or country, instead it is a reference from SE for a geo target.
